title: Katha Solla Porom (2016)
overview: A couple finds their child missing and the woman who stole the baby goes into coma. Eight years later, four kids from an orphanage go to a summer camp. And one of them is the lost baby!
storyline: Katha Solla Porom is the story of 20 children who grow up in an orphanage far from the city, and long for the love of a mother. also chasing out the kidnapper who abduct newly born child from mother. This movie shows the heart of each orphanage kids and how lucky we are to have family. Movie is full of fun, nice touching dialogues.
